# DigitalJamath - Open Source Masjid Management Platform

> The Modern ERP for Islamic Community Management

## Overview

DigitalJamath is a comprehensive, open-source platform designed specifically for mosques (masjids) and Islamic community organizations. It provides tools for member management, financial transparency, and community engagement while maintaining strict Shariah compliance principles.

## Core Features

### Member Management (Jamath Census)
- Complete household and member database
- Socio-economic profiling
- Family relationship tracking
- Skills and profession database

### Financial Management (Baitul Maal)
- Strict fund silos for Zakat, Sadaqah, and operational funds
- Double-entry accounting ledger
- Full audit trail for every transaction
- Automated receipt generation

### Membership & Subscriptions
- Auto-generated membership IDs
- Annual fee tracking
- Payment reminders
- Digital receipt vault

### Member Portal
- OTP-based mobile login
- Digital membership ID card
- Payment history and receipts
- Service request submission

### Service Requests
- Certificate requests (Nikah, Birth, Death)
- Character references
- Administrative documents
- Status tracking

### Announcements
- Community notifications
- Event announcements
- Broadcast via multiple channels

### Basira AI Guide
- Intelligent platform assistant
- Natural language queries
- Data-driven insights

### Staff Management (RBAC)
- Role-based access control
- Committee member roles
- Treasurer-specific views
- Complete activity logging

## Technical Details

- **Backend**: Django + Django REST Framework
- **Frontend**: React + Vite + Shadcn UI
- **Database**: PostgreSQL (multi-tenant)
- **Deployment**: Docker Compose
- **License**: MIT (Open Source)
